item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将下滑，英镑维持在 1.27 美元上方
中国禁止其他国家向美国销售商品开创先例
item.description: 中国政府已着手将其国内法律延伸至国际边界，禁止向美国销售某些商品，该禁令适用于中国境内外的公司。【原文：Beijing has set out to extend its domestic laws across international borders with a ban on selling some goods to the US that applies to companies both inside and outside China.】

item.title: 土耳其监管机构解除对前 50 大股票的卖空禁令
item.description: 土耳其取消了沽空顶级股票的禁令，这一期待已久的举措缓解了投资者对市场准入的担忧。【原文：Turkey removed a ban on short-selling top stocks, a long-awaited move that eases investor concerns over market accessibility.】

item.title: 伊朗称成功进行了长期遭西方批评的太空发射
item.description: 巴林马纳马（美联社）— 伊朗周五表示，它成功地进行了一次太空发射，这是西方指控伊朗改进德黑兰弹道导弹计划的最新一次。【原文：MANAMA, Bahrain (AP) — Iran said Friday it conducted a successful space launch, the latest for its program the West alleges improves Tehran’s ballistic missile program.】

item.title: 英国广播公司称，南非橄榄球队获得了竞争对手 3.72 亿美元的转播权竞标
item.description: 据《商业日报》报道，一个由四家公司组成的集团出价 67 亿兰特（约合 3.72 亿美元）竞购南非橄榄球联盟卫冕冠军 Springboks 的商业权益。【原文：A group comprising four companies made a rival 6.7 billion-rand ($372 million) bid to buy a stake in the commercial rights of South Africa’s Springboks, the reigning rugby-union world champions, Business Day reported.】

item.title: 中国棉花集团敦促优衣库等使用新疆纤维
item.description: 在优衣库母公司负责人表示该时装零售商不从新疆采购纤维后，一家中国行业协会敦促国际公司使用新疆生产的棉花。【原文：A Chinese industry association urged international companies to use cotton produced in Xinjiang after the head of Uniqlo’s parent said the fashion retailer doesn’t source fiber from the region.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚就延长俄罗斯天然气管道交易至三月后进行谈判
item.description: 塞尔维亚正在与俄罗斯谈判延长将于 3 月到期的天然气供应合同，目标是获得与目前与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）签订的协议类似的天然气供应量。【原文：Serbia is in talks with Russia to extend a natural gas supply contract that expires in March, and is targeting volumes similar to those under the current agreement with Gazprom PJSC.】

item.title: 印度采取措施吸引更多资金流入以遏制卢比下跌
item.description: 印度央行表示，将允许银行提高向非居民印度人提供的利率，以吸引更多资金流入，阻止卢比下跌。【原文：India’s central bank said it will allow banks to raise interest rates they can offer non-resident Indians, as it seeks to attract more inflows to stem a decline in the rupee.】

item.title: 中国将在特朗普回国前促进本国企业采购
item.description: 中国将在政府采购中为本国制造的产品提供价格优势，这一举措很可能是为了帮助国内制造商抵御美国可能提高关税的影响。【原文：China will give products made in the country a price advantage in government procurement, a step likely aimed at helping domestic manufacturers weather possible tariff hikes by the US.】

item.title: 勒索软件团伙的无情打击让小公司血本无归
item.description:
俄罗斯黑客入侵英国一家拥有 158 年历史的运输企业的内幕。【原文：

The inside story of Russian hackers who broke into a 158-year-old UK transport business.

】

item.title: 勒庞比剑更强大
item.description:
市场似乎对法国没有陷入混乱感到欣慰，并认为欧洲明年的国防开支前景良好。【原文：

Markets seem appeased that France isn’t in chaos, and see good prospects for European defense spending next year. 

】

item.title: 盛宝不可能的预测：特朗普将把美元炸飞
item.description:
首席宏观策略师约翰-哈迪（John Hardy）做客Merryn Talks Money，讨论将颠覆金融市场的牵强事件年度清单。【原文：

Chief Macro Strategist John Hardy joins Merryn Talks Money to discuss the annual list of far-fetched events that would upend financial markets. 

】

item.title: 圣诞招聘广告处于衰退水平，为英国经济敲响警钟
item.description:
Reed Recruitment表示，预算正在打击企业和消费者，使英国的近期前景更加黯淡。【原文：

Reed Recruitment says budget is hitting firms and consumers, adding gloom over Britain’s near-term prospects.

】

item.title: 民调显示欧洲央行将加快减息步伐以重振疲软经济
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲央行的降息速度将比之前设想的更快，以提振面临增长和通胀疲软的经济。【原文：The European Central Bank will cut interest rates more rapidly than previously envisaged to perk up an economy facing weaker growth and inflation, a Bloomberg survey showed.】

item.title: 尽管经济增长乏力，印度央行仍维持利率不变
item.description: 印度央行在今年最后一次政策会议上维持基准利率不变，理由是尽管经济增长下滑，但通胀压力依然存在。【原文：India’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged in the last policy meeting of the year, citing continued inflationary pressures even though economic growth slumped.】

item.title: 特朗普上任在即，亚行行长康达密切关注美国政策
item.description: 亚洲开发银行新任行长表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫在即，他将重点关注美国政策对该地区的影响。【原文：The Asian Development Bank’s incoming president indicated that US policy will be a key focus as he monitors its impact in the region with Donald Trump’s return to the White House looming.】

item.title: 中国股市在关键会议召开前跳涨，寄望刺激经济
item.description: 中国股市跃升至两周来的最高水平，因为一些交易商认为下周的关键政策会议将发布进一步的刺激措施。【原文：Chinese stocks jumped to the highest level in two weeks as some traders positioned for further stimulus to be released at a key policy meeting next week.】

item.title: Navis Capital 为首支私人信贷基金融资 1.35 亿美元
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封致投资者的信显示，Navis Capital Partners 在获得首轮投资者承诺后，已为其首支私人信贷基金筹集到超过 1.35 亿美元的资金。【原文：Navis Capital Partners has raised over $135 million for its first private credit fund after an initial round of investor commitments, according to a letter to investors seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 世界首富现在是美国最大的政治捐助者
item.description: 2024 年，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）向政治团体投入了至少 2.74 亿美元，助长了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统宝座的消费狂潮，并为自己赢得了一个新头衔：大选周期最多产的捐赠者。【原文：Elon Musk poured at least $274 million into political groups in 2024, fueling a spending spree that helped Donald Trump win the presidency, and securing a new title for himself: the most prolific donor of the election cycle.】

item.title: 习近平新一轮军事清洗是他推翻敌对集团以来范围最广的一次
item.description: 习近平主席第一次赶走几位高级将领，是为了清除共产党内的一个对立权力基础。现在，他甚至要除掉自己的一位忠实拥护者，这表明军方出现了新的问题。【原文：The first time President Xi Jinping ousted several top generals, he was removing a rival power base in the Communist Party. Now he’s even getting rid of one of his own loyalists, suggesting fresh problems with the military.】

item.title: 淡马锡公司将向陈大亨出售马来西亚 5G 赢家的股份
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正在削减其在一家马来西亚电话公司的投资，该公司最近赢得了一份重要的 5G 合同，该公司将其部分股权出售给了一个由富豪陈云生（Vincent Tan）和马来西亚国王女儿控制的实体。【原文：A Temasek Holdings Pte firm is cutting its investment in a Malaysian phone company that recently won a major 5G contract, selling part of its stake to an entity controlled by tycoon Vincent Tan and the Malaysian king’s daughter.】

item.title: 随着对印度央行放宽利率的希望升温，Nifty 大牛逼近 25,000 点
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 世界银行筹集创纪录的 1,000 亿美元援助最贫穷国家
item.description: 世界银行收到了通过其向最贫穷国家提供低息贷款和赠款的部门部署 1 000 亿美元的承诺。【原文：The World Bank received pledges to deploy a record of $100 billion via its unit focused on low-interest loans and grants to the poorest nations.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体称企业可以战胜挑战
item.description: 中国国家媒体在高层经济决策者召开重要会议前称，尽管面临国内需求疲软和残酷竞争等诸多不利因素，但中国企业的信心正在恢复。【原文：The confidence of Chinese companies is recovering despite a number of headwinds including weak domestic demand and cutthroat competition, state media said before key meetings of top economic decision-makers.】

item.title: 日本希望与特朗普举行包括削减汽车关税在内的会谈
item.description: 日本外相岩屋武表示，东京打算与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重启贸易谈判，并将取消汽车和汽车零部件关税列入议程。【原文：Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya said Tokyo intends to pick up trade talks with President-elect Donald Trump with an understanding that the elimination of tariffs on cars and auto parts will be on the agenda.】

item.title: 稀土提炼厂遭警告，伊鲁卡股价暴跌
item.description: 在摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示 Eneabba 稀土项目面临经济和执行风险之后，Iluka Resources Ltd. 股价暴跌达 10%，尽管该公司已从澳大利亚政府获得 4 亿澳元（2.58 亿美元）的新资金。【原文：Iluka Resources Ltd. shares tumbled as much as 10% after Morgan Stanley said the Eneabba rare earths project faces economic and execution risks, even after it received A$400 million ($258 million) in fresh funding from the Australian government.】

item.title: 寄望美联储降息的债券交易员从美国就业数据中寻找线索
item.description: 为美联储将在本月晚些时候降息的押注寻求支持的债券交易商将密切关注周五公布的美国 11 月份就业报告。【原文：Bond traders seeking support for bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this month will closely watch Friday’s US employment report for November.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆展示英语与特朗普建立友好关系
item.description: 墨西哥领导人用流利的英语与唐纳德-特朗普通了电话，这让他大吃一惊。【原文：Mexico’s leader surprised Donald Trump in a phone call by speaking in fluent English, an ability he’s rarely encountered with Latin American leaders.】

item.title: 中国股票基金击败 97% 的同行，押注廉价国企
item.description: 一位绩优的中国基金经理通过重点关注国有企业，在本地股过山车般的一年中击败了同行，他仍然看好这些企业，因为它们的估值较低。【原文：A top-performing Chinese fund manager, who has beaten peers in a roller-coaster year for local shares by focusing on state-owned firms, is still bullish on the cohort due to their low valuations.】

item.title: 华尔街银行预测中国十年来最大幅度降息
item.description: 华尔街多家银行认为，随着决策者加大力度支撑经济增长和遏制通货紧缩，中国央行明年将实施十年来最大幅度的降息。【原文：China’s central bank will deliver the biggest interest-rate cuts in a decade next year as policymakers intensify efforts to shore up growth and arrest deflation, in the view of a number of Wall Street banks.】
